page.title: 11BROUGHTY FERRY - POPULATION
page.content: There is a tremendous cross-section of ages of people living in Broughty Ferry. Younger families tend to live in the newer private housing estates such as Balgillo while older residents tend to reside in the more established parts nearer the centre of Broughty Ferry.Some sheltered housing is available for the elderly,and there are several residential homes for those unable to live on their own. Broughty Ferry with its excellent, convenient facilities is a much sought after area for retired people. Considerable movement of population is apparent especially as this is an attractive residential area. This is particularly evident in the housing estates where families are younger and parents are moved subject to business commitments.
